appliedGuidelines.reason: Already present in Tech Stack Instruction file as core principles of code clarity and maintainability.
Added Java version guideline to align with project standards.
Added access modifiers guideline to conform with project preference for public access.
Added design patterns guideline to encourage aggressive use of patterns.
Added encapsulation guideline to keep implementation details public.
Added Spring Boot version guideline to specify framework version.
Added configuration guideline to prefer properties over YAML and externalize configuration.
Added repository pattern guideline to avoid Spring Data JPA and prefer SQL prepared statements.
